name: salepoint-aws-webapp
description: Sale Point AWS Web Application - Centralized sales data platform

scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file infrastructure/main-template.yaml --stack-name salepoint-stack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.deploy-lambda: cd lambda-functions && zip -r ../lambda-deployment.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name SalePointProductsFunction --zip-file fileb://../lambda-deployment.zip
scripts.setup: npm run install-frontend && npm run install-lambda

author: Sale Point Team
